short_summary: Request for Proposal to purchase one (1) optical vibrometry system
description: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) require one (1) optical vibrometry system including applicable accessories, training and technical support. Piecing together and benefiting from optical vibrometry systems will improve RMC's experimental abilities providing improved data, faster experimentation, and more stable results.
full_summary:
================
### Request for Proposal: Optical Vibrometry System

**Tender Title:** 31034-233630 - Optical Vibrometry System

**Reference Number:** WS3530684524-Doc3731234787

**Solicitation Number:** WS3530684524

**Publication Date:** November 24, 2022

**Closing Date:** January 23, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de Proposition)

**Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)

**Scope:** The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) - Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics (HAA) group has a requirement for one (1) optical vibrometry system, including applicable accessories, training, and technical support.

**Procurement Method:** Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Geographical Scope:** The provision of the goods and services is required to be delivered to British Columbia.

**Language of Communication:** English and French

**Title of the Government Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

- Name: Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shayлан.steиn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Description: Please direct all inquiries and requests for clarification to the above contact.

**Procurement notices and additional information:**

For more information on the tender process, please visit the Ariba website and navigate to the following link:
   [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14718956?extsite=MTQ3MTg5NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14718956?extsite=MTQ3MTg5NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

End of entry. Thank you for your time reading this announcement. Just let me know of any further questions or tasks. 

Best regards, [Your Name].
